pluginStudioDescription: A tool to create custom hand and pose gestures.
studioCreateNewTooltip: Create a new gesture using the Gesture Studio
studioGestureDescPlaceholder: Describe when and how to perform this gesture.
studioAnalysisStatusFailed: Could not extract features. Try re-recording.
toastSetupDataMissing: Setup data missing. Please define gesture first.
toastCaptureAllSamples: Please capture all required samples first.
toastNoGeneratedCode: No gesture definition generated yet to save.
toastSampleCaptureFailedNoLandmarks: Could not detect landmarks. Please ensure the hand or pose is clearly visible in the frame.
toastSampleCaptureFailedGeneric: Could not capture a valid sample (no landmarks or image). Please try again.
studioCreationTypeTitle: What kind of gesture do you want to create?
studioCreationTypeStaticDesc: Recognize a specific, consistent hand shape or body pose.
studioCreationTypeDynamicDesc: Measure the distance between two points (e.g., thumb and index finger).
studioSelectTwoPointsPrompt: Click two landmarks on the image to measure the distance between them.
studioCalibrateMinPrompt: Position your hand for the minimum distance (0% confidence) and click 'Record Min'.
studioCalibrateMaxPrompt: Position your hand for the maximum distance (100% confidence) and click 'Record Max'.
studioDynamicAnalysisPlaceholder: Dynamic gestures are defined by calibration, not statistical analysis.
studioTwoPointsRequired: Please select two landmarks to continue.
